name: Chen Peleg
aboutMe: Founder of Adam Hevra Veteva school for at-risk youth. Passionate about technology and its ability to improve our lives. Developed technological systems for multiple schools, alongside being a teacher and an educator. In recent years I have been focusing on developing educational games and software to help the students learn better and in more enjoyable and varied ways. Now I am interested in full-time work in development.
